Title: Limits options for plea bargaining for repeat driving while under the influence of alcohol or drug offenders
Summary: Limits options for plea bargaining for repeat driving while under the influence of drugs or alcohol offenders by precluding the plea to a lesser offense where the offender has been convicted of a driving while under the influence of drugs or alcohol offense within the previous 10 years.
LawCode: Amd ยง1192, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to limiting options for plea bargaining for certain repeat driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs offenders
